Glory to God! Jesus is Lord!
I believe... I believe that Jesus is the Son of God!
It's true! The gospel is really true! Jesus is Lord and Christ!
Jesus Christ is Lord of all... and I believe in my heart that God raised him from the dead!
Never man spake like this man. I know in my heart that Jesus is the Lord.
Today is the day of salvation! I'm following Christ from now on!
Jesus is the Messiah, the Christ! To whom else can I go? He has the words of eternal life!
